english_translation: The one who remembers the evening of life and smiles is a happy soul.
Just as a bird returns smiling to its nest.

kannada_original: ಇರವು ಅಳಿವಿನ ರೀತಿ ನೆರಳು ಬೆಳಕಿನ ಆಟ ;
english_transliteration: Iravu aḷivina rīti neraḷu beḷakina āṭa ;
english_translation: The existence and destruction are like the play of shadow and light.
Death is the final song (elegy)! – Muddu Rama.
